summary: Initial ICP dapp scaffold implemented: Motoko backend canister + React/Vite/Tailwind frontend using shadcn/ui components, Internet Identity auth hooks, and local storage utilities, packaged with a reusable build/deploy template.
architectural_notes: Project structured as an ICP dapp with a Motoko backend canister and a separate React/Vite frontend.
Frontend integrates Internet Identity for authentication and uses an actor-based client pattern for canister calls.
UI layer standardized on Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui component primitives.
Repository includes a reusable build/deploy template (Docker + scripts + canister yaml) to standardize packaging and deployment.
Frontend adds custom ESLint rules to enforce Internet Identity provider usage and prevent problematic BigInt usage in query keys.
known_issues: In production (v4), the previously available "Order" button is not showing on the site UI as expected.

existing_features.title: Add a "Laundry Price Calculator" UI that matches the user-provided item list and pricing: Shirt ₹10, Pant ₹10, Saree ₹50, Paithani Saree ₹100, Drilling Saree ₹150; include quantity number inputs for each item (default 0) and show a total in INR starting at "Total: ₹0".

Publish/deploy the current application build to production without changing the existing custom domain configuration.
Add an "Order" action back to the Laundry Price Calculator UI so the user can proceed after calculating totals.
Add a visible WhatsApp contact number (+917248903366) to the Laundry Price Calculator order flow UI, using English labels and consistent styling with the existing calculator card.

Include the captured Customer Name in the prefilled WhatsApp message generated for the order, together with the existing customer contact number, address, line items, and grand total, while keeping the WhatsApp destination number as +917248903366.
